title: supersayan30
author: supersayan30
content: A thoughtful project based on lessons learned from a turbulent year. Please feel free to provide feedback.CeDeFi Borrowing & Lending Platform for Institutions & Individuals ByteX Lend is designed to inherit the transparent, auditable, and immutable nature of decentralized finance while benefiting from the safety and accountability of centralized finance.ByteX Lend is a CeDeFi Borrowing & Lending Platform, Powered by Circle for Funds Transfer.We are building a transparent and trustworthy platform and CeDeFi financial tool that is diversified, regulated, and compliant with optional custody. LinksWebsite: https://bytex.io/lendExchanges: https://bytex.io/Twitter: https://twitter.com/bytex_ioFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/ByteX.official/Token economics: https://linktr.ee/bytex.io

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Why the self-moderated?Do you happen to be the same project as this one? BYTEX CRYPTO EXCHANGE AND BYT TOKEN LAUNCHING ANNOUNCEMENT posted by username bytex.io and abandoned long ago? Why create a new ann with different account, not to mention the self moderation?

comments.author: supersayan30
comments.body: HiThis project has no relation to the earlier one. The domain was recently bought and you can verify it on a wayback machine or whois. With respect to self moderated, since its a "pre- ANN" and not an "ANN." Also, noticed there is no working link to the whitepaper hyperlinked by the earlier project.
